text: Energy war is being waged": former oil boss warns of price rises after Ukraine infrastructure attacks. 🚨💥 The destruction of Ukrainian energy infrastructure by Russia will lead to a dramatic rise in European energy prices, warns Andriy Kobolyev, former CEO of Ukraine's state-owned oil company. 💰🔥 The attack on Ukraine's gas storage facilities in the west has already caused a significant spike in European gas prices. 📉 We must act now to provide Ukraine with more weapons to protect its energy infrastructure and prevent further damage. 💪🏽🇺🇦
